ARABIC: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَعْطَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلْقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Our Lord is He who gives each thing its created form and then guides it.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Moses) said: "Our Lord is He who gave everything its natural form and directed it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: "Our Lord is He Who gave everything its form and then guided it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They replied, "Our Lord is the One Who has created all things and has given guidance".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Our Lord is One Who gave everything its proper shape, then showed the path.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: [Musa] said: "Our Lord is He Who gave to each thing its form and nature, then guided it aright."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Our Lord is He Who gave to everything its creation, then guided it (to its goal).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Our Lord is He who gave everything its creation, then guided it.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Our Lord is He Who gave unto everything its nature, then guided it aright.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses replied, "Our Lord is He who has given everything its form, then guided it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Musa said: our Lord is He who vouchsafed unto everything its creation, then guided it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Our Lord is He who gave everything its creation and then guided it.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Our Lord is He Who gave to each (created) thing its form and nature, and further, gave (it) guidance."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Musa (Moses)] said: "Our Lord is He Who gave to each thing its form and nature, then guided it aright."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Our Lord' he replied, 'is He Who gave everything its creation and then guided it'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Our Lord is He who gave everything its existence, then guided it.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "Our Lord is He who gave each thing its form and then guided [it]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:50] He said, ‘Our Lord is He Who gave to everything, in creation, its [peculiar] nature, through which it is distinguished from another [thing], and then guided [it]’, the animal among them to its source of food, drink and procreation and in other ways.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said: Our Lord is He Who gave unto everything its nature) its shape, He gave to humans human progeny, to camels, donkeys and sheep progenies of their own species, (then guided it aright) then He inspired them how to eat, drink and copulate.
